projects.title: Pomodoro Timer
projects.description:
Productivity-enhancing desktop application with customizable intervals and notification.

Nothing beats the simplicity of a Pomodoro timer for boosting productivity and focus.

If you cannot make you do it, let this timer help you do it.

+100% productivity

projects.title: Batch Filename Substring Remover
projects.description:
Efficient file management utility available on PyPI for bulk file renaming and directory processing.

Instead of complex command: 'find /path/to/directory -depth -name "*substring1*" -o -name "*substring2*" -o -name "*substring3*" -exec bash -c 'new_name="${0//substring1/}"; new_name="${new_name//substring2/}"; new_name="${new_name//substring3/}"; mv "$0" "$new_name"' {} \;'

You can use simple 'butch-rename /path/to/directory substring1 substring2'

+150% to your time
